name: is this in your mind? - #gmtkjam
description:
is this in your mind? is a game about surviving the forest and managing your hallucinations through Window's file explorer (or a script if you're cheeky).

Controls:

  • Movement -WASD | IJKL | Arrrow Keys
  • Attack - Z  | / | Spacebar
  • Onscreen Elements and Windows Explorer are navigated with the mouse

WARNING - the game edits its own directory (but nothing else)!

Credits:

  • Rachel Vancleave(marp) (@Sindiewen | https://sindiewen.itch.io/) - Programmer, game design
  • Konata-Chan(asdfg) - Programmer, Game Design

  • lemm0 (eh) - Art, Game Design
  • Rose(lolidk) - Music, Game Design
